events.message: The insured reported a car collision that happened on 2024-02-28 involving their sedan and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning vehicle collision and damages sustained.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case and is now the point of contact for all communications regarding the accident.
The insurer formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured prompt processing to the customer.
The agent requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage and a police report to support the investigation.
The customer uploaded the required photos, vehicle damage assessment, and the official police accident report as requested.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted documents, including eyewitness statements and traffic camera footage.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and damage estimates have been finalized for the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover full repair costs of the car as per the damage assessment report.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the quick investigation and the settlement amount proposed for repair coverage.
The claim was officially approved and processed for payment to the repair service as per the settlement agreement.
Payment was sent directly to the repair shop to cover the costs for the vehicle damage repairs.
The claim was closed successfully after the customer confirmed the repairs were completed to their satisfaction.
All documentation and records related to the claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
